name: Shafted (luisgustavops)
description:
Game made for Houdini Game Jam 2020

Controls: 

WASD / Left Stick - move

mouse / Right Stick - rotate camera

Space / A - jump

hold Shift / hold RT - sprint (long jump)

R / RB - toggle Sprint

Q / LT - slow time

hold Ctrl / hold LB - walk slowly

Lore: 

   Poor Timmy woke up one day to find himself without shoes in a hot cave. The stench of a pig was filling his nostrils, but the zipper on his leathery mask was stuck! How did he end up in this hellish situation? 

   Timmy did not know, but something was calling for him in this strange cave. It was no use to panic,

   Timmy decided to move instead.
